Traits.Name: Distorted Soul
Traits.Description:
• When not bloodied, gain resistance to damage from any melee attack. However, all ranged attacks against it becomes divine.
• When bloodied, gain resistance to damage from any ranged attack. However, all melee attacks against it become divine.

Actions.Name: Distort Foe
Actions.Description: A foe in range 5 must save or become marked. While marked, the effects of Distorted Soul from this demon also apply to them. This mark is removed if the color demon is defeated.
